title: Friday Holiday for Public Sector, but NOT for essential services
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka’s Cabinet of Ministers has approved the proposal to declare Friday a holiday for the Public Sector.
However, the four-day work week will not apply to Essential Services including Electricity Supply, Water Supply, Education, and Security.
